entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , The Pas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: The Pas Airport 08:19 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.0°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -19.7°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
